com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.subsystems

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.subsystems.EntityManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, IActiveClass, IManager

    public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IManager
    Wrapper for LibGDX Ashley entity management system. An instance is registered to a World.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to add to engine
